VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.label: fire
VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the capability to utilize and manage fire for various purposes. Unlocks firefighting job.

VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.label: agriculture
VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to grow various staple crops. Unlocks growing job.

VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.label: cultivation
VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.description: Expand crop variety with more specific, difficult to grow plants, such as smokeleaf or psychoid plant.

VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.label: medicine
VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.description: Introduce basic medical care and herbal treatment methods. Unlocks doctoring and patient jobs.

VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.label: animal handling
VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to grow various staple crops. Unlocks growing job.

VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.label: mining
VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.description: Develop methods to extract resources from the earth using force. Unlocks mining job.

VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.label: construction
VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the absolute basic techniques of building and structural design. Unlocks the ability to build walls and roofs.

VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.label: furniture
VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.description: Introduce basic furniture crafting for improved living conditions.

VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.label: tribalwear
VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.description: Introduce basic furniture crafting for improved living conditions.

VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.label: hunting
VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.description: Introduce basic furniture crafting for improved living conditions.

VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.label: weapons
VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.description: Introduce basic weaponry for defense against enemies.

VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.label: bow
VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the ability to craft the staple of ranged combat - a short bow.

VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.label: culture
VFETribals.TribalResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the ability to conduct research, as well as develop ideological thoughts. Unlocks intellectual job.
